definitions.definition: ( Christianity , Judaism ) Father ; religious superior; in the Syriac , Coptic , and Ethiopic churches, a title given to the bishops, and by the bishops to the patriarch ; a title given to Jewish scholars in the Talmudic period.

main_definition: ( Christianity , Judaism ) Father ; religious superior; in the Syriac , Coptic , and Ethiopic churches, a title given to the bishops, and by the bishops to the patriarch ; a title given to Jewish scholars in the Talmudic period.

definitions.definition: Alternative form of aba ( Middle Eastern garment ) .

main_definition: Alternative form of aba ( Middle Eastern garment ) .
